description: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) from a healthy donor (same donor as pbmc4k). PBMCs are primary cells with relatively small amounts of RNA (~1pg RNA/cell). Used Chromium v2 chemistry and Cell Ranger 1.3.0 software.  8403 cells were detected.

submitter.address: 7068 Koll Center Parkway Suite 401; Pleasanton, CA 94566 USA
submitter.name: 10X Genomics Inc.

title: Peripheral blood mononuclear cells (PBMCs) from a healthy donor
